alert.note: Alert for Hood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 6:52AM CST until March 01 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hood County in north central Texas... * Until 745 AM CST. * At 652 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bluff Dale, or 9 miles west of Granbury, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Granbury, Pecan Plantation, Lipan, Oak Trail Shores, Squaw Creek Reservoir, DeCordova, Cresson, Tolar, Stockton Bend, Waples, Mambrino, Lake Granbury and Acton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
